name: Last Minutes On Cat Island
description:
Your vacation on Cat Island has been a blessing. Seize the moment by the sea and make it to your ship in time in this minimalistic finite runner!

Last Minutes On Cat Island is a minimalistic 2D finite runner set at a seaside.

Breath in fresh breeze as you hurry to your ship back home. Enjoy the meditative sea view from the platforms, but keep your distance from lovely island residents unless you want to be late on board!

Features
  • Minimalistic character design
  • Relaxing summer holiday vibes
  • Cats!
Credits Programming, sound design
Mnim: https://mnim.itch.io/ Idea, UI & main character animations
Tolik: https://twitter.com/BrigadierCone Additional art
Alina: realminioreal@gmail.com, https://t.me/realminio
